text:
[Section: Page 624 of 1048]



Message 2377 of 4024
So, what were the boys told about Spring Break and why they are not going anywhere? AD seemed to think this was my fault.. Any insight there since
you are the single source of information?
And please, please do not go after him again like you did vacationing in California, and talked to me. For that matter, I’d rather not know than I
would want to put that boy in the middle of our mess even more.
Just trying to effectively coparent in a very awkward situation..thanks!
Sent:04/05/2024 at 09:18 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 04/06/2024 at 08:50 AM)
Subject:Re: Spring break
Message 2378 of 4024
I’m struggling with why you won’t answer that question, Christine. Why wont you work together on what we’re telling the kids? We should not
disparage each other to them, right?
That has been advised since the first court video we watched “What about the Kids” and with every therapists since. So please don’t keep your “Dad
narrative” top-secret?
As mentioned, I feel like there has been a steady drumbeat of parental alienation since this all started. And, yes, that’s just my own POV. But it’s these
things that fuel those concerns.
I know that is not your intent. I know we both only want the best for them. So please help me, help our kids, so we leave them out of adult business
they should be insulated from.
Looking forward to your feedback as your coparent.
Sent:04/06/2024 at 11:37 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 04/06/2024 at 05:01 PM)
Subject:Re: Spring break
Message 2379 of 4024
The kids were told we would pivot and look at alternatives.
It appears you spoke to Adrian. Asked I don’t verify what you are saying he said.
I am looking at options in the US for Spring Break. Adrian will not attend the game tomorrow night.
The Cabo number below works. I called yesterday and was informed you had just called and cancelled the April 6 week, and was told it’s still available
to use for another week.
I cancelled April 13, which is still available for use.
Sent:04/06/2024 at 05:11 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 04/06/2024 at 05:17 PM)
Subject:Re: Spring break

Message 2380 of 4024
Of course, I spoke to Adrian. I was walking him to the car, and that is when he discussed not being able to go on Spring Break like all of his friends.
That is when I got the impression it was portrayed as "my fault". If it was not, great. All I can do is trust you, and I appreciate the partnership in their
best interest. Thank you.
I worry when you say things like this: "Asked I don’t verify what you are saying he said.". I feel like Divorce 101 is not putting your kids in the middle
of your crap. I gave the example of when you brought him into our business In Cali and how awful that was for his psyche.
In our final visit, Dr. Brown noted that I needed to "take one for the team" and not explain what happened with the cam to him. I did, and I have
never brought it up since. As I have said, the kids are not supposed to be a part of this. It is our business and our fault.
So, getting them to "verify" statements for you to triangulate is a horrifying thought. Please don't make me ask you not to put them in the middle. If
we disagree, can we at least sidebar with someone ASAP? If we disagree there, it is a big problem.
Please see the attached for the warnings I sent in Jan. This is not a mystery. I  saw this a mile away, told you about it, and asked to partner, but you
insisted on your plan instead of professional recommendations. I really wish we had worked together back then.
I am also unsure why you would cancel Cabo. I asked for two dinners—three total hours at most over a full week. I was going to stay far away and not
see you. I don't get why taking away the entire vacation I take AD to every year, with you guys joining later, is good parenting..
It honestly feels like you would do anything to them to punish me. I hope that is not true.
I would still like to see them as requested. That has not changed, so please let me know.
The number did not work. See attached. You can see multiple failed calls. Please don't try so hard to be "correct" on everything that you feel the need
to point out that someone in the tech industry for 30 years can't recognize when a phone number does not work. That doesn't make sense.
But I finally got through when I called the lady who I worked with on the "30-person weeks" you booked for someone else during the prime season
after saying I had them this year. I'd love to understand what the heck that is and what we got in exchange so I can use it, too. Just let me know what's
up. honestly, please
And so what was April the 13th? Is that the other Presidential at Grand Sol Mar? Please don't tell me that you had that during prime time and just
canceled it w/o offering it to me after you said I had it this year and next. I was on the phone with them last week to figure out how to get into Sol
Mar, and it's obviously impossible to do.
So if we had that, given you know what that means to me, and just killed it, that is an extraordinarily vengeful and malicious thing to do. Doing
nothing would have been easier and I would have loved it. But you purposely went out of your way not to let me have something nice.
This whole thing is so far out of hand now, Christine. I would love to find a way to peacefully uncouple and help the kids. They don't want us to hate
each other. Can we just start playing nicely together? I'm not asking to be friends, but let's please partner to co-parent. We don't have to hate and
want to destroy one another. There is a better way that we won't regret for years to come. Please consider it.
Q's:
- Can I see our children over their spring break?
- Can you explain the confusion on the Time Share?
Sent:04/06/2024 at 06:21 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 04/06/2024 at 11:56 PM)
Subject:Re: Spring break
Attachments:911_AD_Needs_Help.pdf (74 KB)
AD_Text_1.jpg (85 KB)
image_123650291.JPG (377 KB)

- Any way we can pause and partner for the kids?
Attachments:
- Plea to you back in Jan dialing 911 for AD's mental health
- Text of him blaming himself because he is in the middle
- Call log of the Grand Sol Mar phone # not going through.
I really would do anything to try and get this on the rails and give them the childhood they deserve before we steal even more than we have. Please
consider... you know where I am...
Message 2381 of 4024
Whoa!! That was WAY too finger pointy to expect cooperation. I want to apologize for the tone. Frustration is not an excuse, and it wont help our
children. Or us for that matter.
This whole thing reminds me of the way we treated each other. And that cost us a 25 year marriage. I’ll do my best not to contribute to replay in our
divorce. Have a great night, and hope you guys all have a memorable spring break. I’ll miss you all dearly...

to book after you said it was mine to use.
Are you saying he will give it back to me after you canceled it? I think that was my point. It took more work to not let me have, than it would have to
Sent:04/07/2024 at 09:42 AM

just tell me. If I misunderstand, that is great!
What’s the deal w/ this week?
Thanks again for the help. This is probably a 5k thread
Message 2385 of 4024
You had this week at Rancho and could have used it this week. You called and cancelled it. You indicated it was burned. They confirmed it was not
and you cancelled, and available to rebook subject to availability.
Next week, you said it was burned. I called and they said no, so I cancelled it so it was not burned. It is still available to use this year, and you need to
rebook subject to availability. As I called late Friday, if you want to try rebook call first thing Monday am.
Rancho is always available.
As indicated previously it is best to book one year out, so if you know your weeks in 2025 for 2 bedroom, you should book it.

From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 04/07/2024 at 11:10 AM)

chance I can see them? Have a great night! Thanks!!!

From:Robert Moyer

I understand Alan is scheduled for this Saturday.

I see one of the kid's tuition seems to have been paid. Thank you for that. It is a good problem to have that we did right by our kids and have done all
we can to set them up for long term success.
Would you let me know which one this one is for? I'd like to slowly try to start organizing things a little better for us when we get to the next phase of
this. Maybe it can save us a little money.
If you disagree with me doing that, or have issues, please let me know. I do not want to ruffle feathers in any way or do something you feel is
counterproductive or inflammatory for us.
thanks!

send it in for the full amount to cover both of us. I think it’s $5500 .
Is that OK with you and then I just pay for us and then we’ll settle up later ?
Not trying to track you at all I hope you have a great day was just worried about  AD and you guys!  And if you know if he’s gonna be back on the

I’m hoping to sincerely get some advice on how I should connect with Adrian. I really want to catch up and chat with him. But honestly, I’m afraid
that he’s going to feel uncomfortable talking. I am not sure if he knows that I have no idea where you guys are and I don’t want to put him in the
Sent:04/11/2024 at 09:51 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 04/11/2024 at 12:14 PM)
Subject:Good morning!

middle.
Obviously it will make me uncomfortable to say how are you doing? What’s going on? So do you have any suggestions on how we can co-parent the
situation together? I don’t wanna feel like I am asking him to be a spy or something like that. Please know I am asking with a sincerest of intentions.
And if you feel uncomfortable, because you feel like I’m trying to create some sort of narrative, that is not in any way, my intention. And I will
understand if you do not want to reply. This is just been the longest I’ve ever gone without chatting with him since perhaps Orkila and I miss him.
He’s all I’ve got left.
Thank you
Have a great day!
Message 2417 of 4024
Agree this is difficult based on how this has played out in the past.
I can’t provide guidance as noted below it will be used as a narrative to fit a POV.
I don’t see anything on the schedule for basketball this Friday or Saturday on Team snap for the Beavers team, so if I am missing something please let
me know.
Sent:04/11/2024 at 01:15 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 04/11/2024 at 01:16 PM)
Subject:Re: Good morning!
Message 2418 of 4024
I think that is my point. I am not and I will repeat. I am not. And will not ever use this as a narrative. I will say this so I look like a jackass to whoever
reads it and I use it to.  This is for Adrian and I am looking to coparent with you without showing this to anyone else, I want to be a good coparent
that is all.
I will offer what I think, I think you let them know that it’s OK to talk about this and it’s not a big secret from dad . We are in this together and we are
putting them first in our lives. They are not in the middle and dad and mom are not gonna fight about anything that you’re doing.
Again, this will never be seen by anybody else. I am not looking to create a situation for leverage in a divorce with you. I am looking to coparent.
Sent:04/11/2024 at 01:19 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 04/11/2024 at 01:30 PM)
Subject:Re: Good morning!
Message 2419 of 4024
I’m trying to get in touch with you. Please call, you don’t pick up. Thank you!
Sent:04/11/2024 at 01:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 04/11/2024 at 01:31 PM)
Subject:Re: Good morning!

Message 2420 of 4024
I am not in a position to pick up. Is it an emergency or urgent?
Again this puts me in an impossible situation to given the history. The children too.
This is exactly what was declared and repeatedly stated before.... Hey I will not use XYZ against you, then it inevitably does. There is not once
instance where this has not been the case.
We can talk to Kari about how to best navigate.
Sent:04/11/2024 at 01:35 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 04/11/2024 at 01:39 PM)
Subject:Re: Good morning!
Message 2421 of 4024
Christine, I am not trying to fight with you. No matter what I’m not trying to fight with you. So let’s please at all cost do not raise the temperature in
this thread.
I think the expectation that I should be able to talk with my children at a bare minimum is not me putting you in an unreasonable situation. It’s not as
visitation.
And my sincere hope is to not put them in the middle of a situation like we have done in the past . I’m looking for a safe way to coparent with you.
If your expectations is that I don’t get to talk to them until next Saturday I think that’s asking a lot . And even then, I don’t know what I can say.
Let’s please not fight . Let’s find a healthy way to just discuss this really quickly. Let’s put them first. I promise to follow your advice. Teamwork!
It is not an emergency, but it is somewhat urgent since it’s already Thursday . Please let me know when you can chat at your convenience. Thank you

Sent:04/11/2024 at 01:44 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 04/11/2024 at 01:56 PM)
Subject:Re: Good morning!
Message 2422 of 4024
I never said you could not talk to them. You are already developing a narrative which is false.
I should have not responded as now you are stating things that are not true.
The statement that “we” not put them in the middle like we have done in the past, is inflammatory.
You have already put out a narrative to the lawyers and Karri about me withholding or doing things that are not in their best interest, when
professionals have stated the exact opposite.
Sent:04/11/2024 at 02:05 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 04/11/2024 at 02:06 PM)
Subject:Re: Good morning!

It will remain to be seen if you continue to drive that narrative forward in the parenting evaluation.
Message 2423 of 4024
Christine, I am emphasizing again. I do not want to fight.. and while you’re saying, I can talk to them, I am also telling you that that puts them in an
uncomfortable spot. We know that.
When you are keeping secrets and they are asked to be in the middle by having conversations with me, it’s putting them in the middle. I am asking for
a way to put them first above our own mess.
I am asking to have a short conversation with you about it rather than put it into OFW so it cannot be Weaponized given your fear . I’m doing
everything in my power to try and coparent safely.
Please let me know your thoughts. I’m not gonna keep pushing this if you won’t work with me.
Sent:04/11/2024 at 02:10 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 04/11/2024 at 04:23 PM)
Subject:Re: Good morning!
Message 2424 of 4024
I will respect your choice to disengage. If you change your mind, please let me know. I'm here.
Also, per this, "when professionals have stated the exact opposite," please share. That will help.
Have a good one!
Sent:04/11/2024 at 04:07 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 04/11/2024 at 04:24 PM)
Subject:Re: Good morning!
Message 2425 of 4024
“When you are keeping secrets?”Explain.
“And they are asked to be in the middle by having conversations with me?” Explain.
Or would you rather just drop those statements as a threat to me, that you will then unload later, like the “6 therapists we consulted that I am on all
the communications on” Happy after consulting your lawyer, you both decided not to share that information and will use as weaponization against
me when the time comes.
Sent:04/11/2024 at 04:29 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 04/11/2024 at 04:32 PM)
Subject:Re: Good morning!
Message 2426 of 4024
I was not trying to fight... I am not planning to use anything against you. I want to work with you.
Sent:04/11/2024 at 05:20 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 04/11/2024 at 06:13 PM)
Subject:Re: Good morning!
Attachments:IMG_2615.PNG (863 KB)

I mentioned when you were explaining your perspective on our past at Kari’s , that I have come to agree with much of your assessment. And now I
am increasingly more inclined to look at the past through your eyes. You were sober and wanted the best for the family, us, and frankly me most of all.
You did your level best and I am forever grateful to you for that.
I may have been angry at the way things went down, and not getting the chance to continue our positive trajectory, but that’s my problem. Not
yours. All I saw was that our life finally seemed happy to me. I was finally making in roads with Max, AD and I were peas in a pod. And you and I, i
had never in our entire 30 years been happier or more hopeful.

Obviously I am not a lawyer, but this is what I understand to be the case ... everything becomes legally binding when our divorce is finalized in
September this year... open to being wrong.
In the state of Washington, the division of community property is typically determined during the divorce proceedings, and this can involve
mediation if the parties choose to resolve their issues outside of court.
The decisions made in mediation about the division of community property become effective once they are formalized in a legally binding document,
often referred to as a “Marital Settlement Agreement” or “Property Settlement Agreement.” However, for these decisions to be legally enforceable,
they usually need to be approved by the court. Once the agreement is incorporated into the final divorce decree and the divorce is finalized by the
court, the division of property as agreed upon in mediation is then legally effective and binding.
So, while parties may agree upon the division of community property during mediation, this division doesn’t go into effect until the divorce is
officially granted by the court and the agreement is entered into the court order. It’s also important for individuals to follow the specific court orders
and local rules, as procedural requirements may vary. Consulting with a legal professional familiar with Washington state divorce law would provide
the most accurate guidance for an individual’s specific situation.
